title.en: Retrieve biodiversity data from the web (1/5)

description.en: This process retrieves biodiveryity data, i.e. occurrences for various species, from the sources GBIF, iNaturalist and VertNet. For more details, please ask BOKU.

input_data.title: Data with species names to download
input_data.description: URL to the input dataframe or directly indicating a vector of species names. If dataframe, provide species column names

colname_species.title: Species column name
colname_species.description: If the data provided in the data path is a dataframe, indicate here the column name with species names.

study_area_extent.title: Area of Interest (Shapefile)
study_area_extent.description: URL to the input shapefile containing the study areas inside which you would like to retrieve occurrences

study_area_geojson_url.title: Area of Interest (GeoJSON)
study_area_geojson_url.description: URL to the input GeoJSON file containing the study areas inside which you would like to retrieve occurrences

study_area_geojson.title: Area of Interest (GeoJSON, directly)
study_area_geojson.description: Directly post the GeoJSON containing the study areas inside which you would like to retrieve occurrences

databases.title: Database names
databases.description: List of databases to consider. Only "gbif, inat, and vertnet" supported

verbose.title: Show messages from checking species names
verbose.description: Logical, TRUE if the messages to be displayed or FALSE for no messages.

warn_checks.title: Show warnings during data download
warn_checks.description: Logical, TRUE if the messages to be displayed or FALSE for no messages.

synonym_checks.title: Either consider synonym from standard databases like FishBase.
synonym_checks.description: Logical, TRUE if synoymns species names should be returned during data checks before data download.

percentage_correctness.title: Allowed percentage name correctness.
percentage_correctness.description: An integer indicating the percentage of species name corretness that should be allowed to be replaced. High values ensures a perfect match from the standard database.

gbif_limit.title: Max number (GBIF)
gbif_limit.description: The maximum number of data points that are being retrieved from GBIF. For details ask Anthony/BOKU.

inaturalist_limit.title: Max number (iNaturalist)
inaturalist_limit.description: The maximum number of data points that are being retrieved from iNaturalist. For details ask Anthony/BOKU.

vertnet_limit.title: Max number (VertNet)
vertnet_limit.description: The maximum number of data points that are being retrieved from VertNet. For details ask Anthony/BOKU.

biodiversity_data.title: Combined occurrences
biodiversity_data.description: A table containing the combined occurrences inside the study area.

inputs.species_names: Squalius cephalus, Salmo trutta, Thymallus thymallus, Anguilla anguilla
